00041         static public string CreateMD5Hash(string input)
00042         {
00043             // Use input string to calculate MD5 hash
00044             MD5 md5 = System.Security.Cryptography.MD5.Create();
00045             byte[] inputBytes = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(input);
00046             byte[] hashBytes = md5.ComputeHash(inputBytes);
00047 
00048             // Convert the byte array to hexadecimal string
00049             StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00050             for (int i = 0; i < hashBytes.Length; i++)
00051             {
00052                 sb.Append(hashBytes[i].ToString("X2"));
00053                 // To force the hex string to lower-case letters instead of
00054                 // upper-case, use he following line instead:
00055                 // sb.Append(hashBytes[i].ToString("x2")); 
00056             }
00057             return sb.ToString().ToLower();
00058         }
00063         static public string sGenerateNewMemberNumber()
00064         {
00065             // TODO: Check for existing number
00066             //Create a new Random class
00067             Random RandomClass = new Random();
00068 
00069             string sRandomNumber1 = RandomClass.Next(100, 999).ToString();
00070             string sRandomNumber2 = RandomClass.Next(100, 999).ToString();
00071             string sRandomNumber3 = RandomClass.Next(100, 999).ToString();
00072             return sRandomNumber1 + " " + sRandomNumber2 + " " + sRandomNumber3;
00073         }

00081         static public string sGetMysqlDate(string date)
00082         {
00083             try
00084             {
00085                 // fetch the en-GB culture
00086                 CultureInfo ukCulture = new CultureInfo("en-GB");
00087                 // pass the DateTimeFormat information to DateTime.Parse
00088                 DateTime dateTime = DateTime.Parse(date, ukCulture.DateTimeFormat);
00089                 return String.Format("{0:yyyy-M-d}", dateTime);
00090             }
00091             catch (FormatException)
00092             {
00093                 return "0000-00-00";
00094             }
00095           
00096         }
00103         static public string sGetCsharpDateFromMysqlDate(string date)
00104         {
00105             try
00106             {
00107                 // fetch the en-US culture
00108                 CultureInfo usCulture = new CultureInfo("en-US");
00109                 // pass the DateTimeFormat information to DateTime.Parse
00110                 DateTime dateTime = DateTime.Parse(date, usCulture.DateTimeFormat);
00111                 return String.Format("{0:d/M/yyyy}", dateTime);
00112             }
00113             catch (FormatException)
